adjective.description: Relating to or denoting an age in the Upper Jurassic period, lasting from about 157 to 155 million years ago.
Relating to or denoting the theory that Edward de Vere (1550–1604), Earl of Oxford, wrote the plays attributed to Shakespeare.

noun.description: The Oxfordian age or the system of rocks (chiefly coral-derived limestones) deposited during it.
A supporter of the Oxfordian theory.
